title: Sampler Blanket #9
medium:
Medium: wool, polyester
Technique: needle punched wool and wool applique with machine embroidery
description: Navy background with a green band on the top.  In the upper right are two snowflakes.  At the left is a pink house, light blue geometric bands and green numbers.  There is an embroidered, light-blue palm tree. On the back, a pink laurel wreath.
name: Blanket
